236564: Something I don’t often notice, the linework, deserves mention here. Along with the very precise coloring (10 pages may seem like few, but they’re all colored), it lends the subjects some wonderful depth; the aunt’s body often feels 3D. Also good storytelling, as mentioned by the uploader.

@Ducket: Thanks Ducket. It's all part of the game, I guess. In the words of the illustrious Riley Freeman, "if people aren't mad at you, you're doing something wrong." In other news, I uploaded Part One of the comic, so it should be up relatively soon. I'm using this upload as a precursor to discover any mistakes I may have made during the process (since I only tend to find them after I upload the manga.) I'm also uploading it to give you guys a preview of what the entire comic will look like, since I know it's been a while. Figure there's no harm since Part One is basically completed. Part Two should be quicker, so the entire comic will be uploaded relatively soon. I have some of it done already, but I spent more time on part one knowing that it would be the most difficult to edit. And I've already done the bonus, so it shoudn't be much longer, guys. Anyway that's all for tonight. Look out for Part One.

@libon23: That's hard to say. As far as storytelling goes, Kuroneko Smith is in a league of his own. I've been reading hentai manga for years, and never have I read a story so subtle and nuanced like this one. And the plot is quite unusual for hentai manga in that usually the female character would submit to her sexual urges (which Kyouko sort of does, but not outright.) And few times I've read stories where the author takes the time to escalate certain aspects of the plot. I mean they (Kyouko and Kouhei) don't really "go at it" until 180-190 pages in. The only story that is somewhat comparable, and I recommend this all the time, is "Immoral Garden" by Yonekura Kengo. It's not as long, but they're identical in that the story escalates. Hope that helps.

Just to give you guys a bit of an update on the comic: things are going smoothly in spite of a few hiccoughs here and there. I'm taking a bit more time on this one since I'm translating everything (yes, I've even gone back to translate part 1 so I can see where I do and don't want to make changes.) For the most part, it'll still be subsik's translation with a few minor changes. I've approached this section by section, meaning, there are times I'll work on certain "scenes" from part 1, and other scenes from part 2. I'm also translating all of the SFX, and redrawing certain parts of some panels to either correct things I don't think look great, or I have no other choice but to redraw. It's a bit more difficult this time around since I have to mimic the grain when I redraw so you guys don't see smooth splotches. Anyway, that's all I can really think of, and if there's anything you want to know about the progress of the comic, let me know.

@HokageNaruto: Unfortunately, at least to my knowledge, there's no planned sequel. Kuroneko Smith has mentioned twice now on his blog that he's producing something new. My hope is that the characters Kyouko and Kouhei will make some cameos in his future projects. Of course, a sequel would be better, but this might be the end of the series.

@DavisGod: I like the second part better than the first, but to be honest neither works without the other. I usually watch part one before I watch part two. For me, it's basically a four hour experience, :) (Though, now I just skim and skip to my favorite parts.) In addition, there's some news. Kuroneko Smith updated his blog (http://b.dlsite.net/RG21616/archives/53739254.html) He posted about the release of the second part of the live action. Furthermore, he briefly mentioned that not only "Oba-san no Karada ga Kimochi Yosugiru Kara' will have a comic version, but "Kaa-san no Ana Tsukawasete" and his new work, which is currently in production, will release one, also.
I just finished part 2, really good, as the first one ;)

@DavisGod: I agree. I first had objections to Hana Haruna, but now I couldn't imagine anyone else playing the role. She really grew on me.
She's cute, and she commits to the part. And while I wouldn't say she's in perfect shape, there were certain scenes (e.g. her giving Ko-chan a blowjob in the shed) where her curves really stood out. And I actually like her appearance; it makes the story more believable, as subjective as that may be. Definitely watch part 2 (I'd recommend the HD version.)

@hotrod1112: Yeah, I really liked it, too. I was a little confused by their choices in cutting parts out and leaving certain parts in. Near the end, I figured they just streamlined it and combined certain parts--particularly that scene when she's in his bedroom at night with that pink night dress. Hana Haruna was great in it. And it's as you said, she as well as her counterpart really brought it to life. One part really made laugh--it was the scene where they have sex at the toilet, and just as Kouhei finished up and pulls up his pants, he makes this face as he says "Ja ne" (goodbye/see you later.) I couldn't stop laughing because it showed how much of a dick Kouhei is.

I'm watching the first JAV and it's really good. I wasn't really expecting much from this movie, especially since I didn't found the actress really beautiful (but she does have a nice tits for playing Kyouko), but in the end I really like what she's doing, she plays well and you can feel that she's trying to give pleasure to her nephew even though it still is emotionless sex. And that's an aspect that I think the doujin version doesn't really show. We know that Kyouko isn't completely reluctant, but she's basically doing it to calm her nephew and be at peace after the sex act. But we don't really see that she's trying to give that much pleasure to Kou-chan. I think the movie is showing that really well. 

I don't know if I was clear but anyway, can't wait to see part 2.

I will surely follow Smith's work. 8TB i like the sequel than the 1st. Its really good. I rarely watch japanese porn but this one considering its also an adaptation..really brought Smith's work to life. Haruna is really great. 👌

@ace0262e: Anything can happen. (It's not like I'm against it continuing--in fact, I would love if it continued.) But this bonus is pretty much Kyouko having flash backs. You do raise a good point about the possibility since in page two, Kyouko's sister does mention visiting in the summer again. I just think that given how Part 2 ended, and Kuroneko stating that he has something new he's working on, it might just be the end. But, only Kuroneko knows for sure.

@silentherow: No problem, man. As far as an uncensored version, I've actually considered decensoring it--some parts are easier than others. Since the comic is scanned from the physical book, there's a lot of grain. Not to mention, there's a lot of nuance in the color. It would be less difficult if the comic were digital, since I'd be able to redraw it using the smoother palettes to which I'm more accustomed. But, I wouldn't say I've given up on it, just yet. I'll take a couple of more cracks at it and see what I come up with, :).

And you've already grasped his motivations, so don't let him get a rise out of you (he'll likely use it as foreplay before he masturbates) As far as the COMIC, I just wanted to let everyone know that production is going smoothly, and that I'll be making minor changes to subsik's translation. As I was looking over the Japanese dialogue, I noticed a few places where I wanted to make adjustments. For example, where Kyouko refers to Kouhei''s erection as a "boner," It'll read instead as "erection." "Boner" is a little too run-of-the-mill porn-like for me. There will be minor changes throughout--i.e. a more literal translation--but not enough of them where I wouldn't still give subsik full credit for translating part one. Just giving you guys a heads up. And I'll update you guys on an significant progress or delays that occur.

@everyone: As some of you may know, I've already started work on adding both subsik's and my translations to the comic. Understandably, this is going to take some time because not only of the sheer length of the comic, but also as those with the sharingan may have noticed, there's a fair bit of grain (which I personally like) and a yellow shift in the color's tint. So I've been spending time adjusting for these factors. Nevertheless, as is my M.O., not only is it my goal to provide you guys with a translated comic in a timely manner, but also to do it in a way that doesn't sacrifice the quality I envision. So look out for the translated version of the comic. (Who knows? You might find a few surprises, ;))

@dakuhiro: Actually, it's not a timeskip per se. The only page that captures the events which takes place after the events of Part 2 is the first page, where you can see Kyouko and her and Kouhei's newborn daughter. The pages which follow are actually part of a flashback (the parts that we didn't get to see) as Kyouko and her sister reminisce about the last year. I imagine they're various trysts that occur between Parts 1 and 2 (mostly part 2.)

Oh, and one more thing you might find useful, I went back to the Japanese Dub of the first part and translated some of the phrases I saw with the resources I have just to test myself and see if I arrived at the same (or at least identical) conclusion as the translator, "Subsik." I did, so I knew I was doing something right.

I started translating this series when I decided that I was not  happy with the approach other translators have taken. I really like this series, so I wanted to do it justice. I think Ducket that if you're committed, you can translate those works of which you spoke. It's all about the effort you're willing to put in to it. I was on overdrive, so to speak, when translating this bonus because I really wanted it translated. And I'd also say that desire is an important component. While I claim to be no expert, I can honestly say that my knowledge of Japanese has increased tremendously with my involvement in this series. Go for it, Ducket! And if you need any pointers, feel free to ask. I await the rest of your questionaire, haha.

@Ducket: I'm not a native Japanese speaker. My knowledge of Japanese consists over a decade of watching anime and hentai, watching youtube videos,  Google Translate, researching Kanji (Hiragana and Katakana,) and conversing with native Japanese speakers from reddit. As it concerns 14 types of Japanese, it's not the language per se, but the Kanji which number in the thousands. And since I translated volume two, I've become familiar with many of the Kanji Kuroneko Smith uses in his work. I agree with you about Google Translate in that it provides a very simplistic picture of what's being said, which is why I research individual words, and verify the accuracy of the translation I'm not to certain of with native Japanese speakers from reddit.

@Darkstar75: Unfortunately, this bonus feature marks the end of the series (allegedly.) I don't suspect that the author will continue any more works with this character. (But you never know, maybe the female and male protagonists, Kyouko  and Kouhei will make cameos in his other works.) His next work, I believe, will involve a mother.

@SireDragoviano: Thanks, and thank you for reading. @DavisGod: I know for certain that the book is sold on Amazon Japan. (I doubt any Western markets have that book in circulation.) You can also check his blog: http://b.dlsite.net/RG21616 (Of course, you'd have to use the translate function from google.) I really like Kuroneko Smith as an artist, but I can't cede title of best (who for me is Oda Non) to him just yet. If he draws more consistently throughout his panels, then he'd easily beat out anyone because when he draws at his best, he is the best in my opinion.

@8TB : Thanks for the hard work man ! Do you know where I could buy this fantastic book ? This hentai is absolutely amazing and I will be glad to pay in order to have the book in my collection.

I would love to see an other story by Kuroneko about a mother and her son. I know he already made one but I didn't find it that great, all the sleeping film is not really what I like. But a story like this one, with the mother instead of the aunt, and Kuroneko will become by far my favorite artist !

@benburnetts @heavening: My aunts are in their mid fifties, so not so much. Though, when I was kid, as it concerned two of my then more attractive aunts, I was privy to seeing their breasts. I was destined to translate this, haha :)
Do you guys like to imagine mating with your aunt? I do.

@DavisGod @pervertGuy: You're welcome. It will take longer for me to add the translations (subsik's and mine) to the comic, but I at least hope that in translating the bonus, we all now have a complete grasp of the overall story. The comic will also take longer for me to complete because it was scanned from a physical book, giving it a grainy appearance. So I'm going to have to adjust for that (as I did with this bonus) when cleaning and editing the pages--not to mention, it's over 240 PAGES!! Nevertheless, I'm committed to seeing this through. So look forward to that guys.

Yeah, Kuroneko said that it would be only 10 pages when he first announced the comic. Nevertheless, Kuroneko Smith, in my honest opinion, is a genius mangaka. The way he set up the premise for this bonus, at least from a storytelling standpoint, is absolutely sublime. To have Kyouko receive a phone call from her sister after giving birth, and their reminiscing about the last year, going through the events, which seem innocent to Kyouko's sister, but riddled with innuendo for Kyouko, as we're taken through these trysts she had with her nephew, Kouhei, is absolutely genius. I was no less than impressed when I was translating this. Kuroneko Smith may not be my favorite artist yet (emphasis on yet,) but he's definitely my favorite storyteller.
Another fine translation, thanks for all the hard work 8TB :D
